title: v1.0.0 — Clean TypeScript rewrite with computed intelligence
items: Clean TypeScript rewrite of all 8 original tools from mcp-server-gsc
Added delete_sitemap tool (missing from original)
Added 7 computed intelligence tools: compare_periods, detect_content_decay, detect_cannibalization, diff_keywords, batch_inspect, ctr_analysis, search_type_breakdown
Added dataState param for fresh data access
Added discover and googleNews search types
Added flexible date ranges (days param as alternative to startDate/endDate)
Added auto-retry with exponential backoff on 429/5xx
Added custom error types (GSCAuthError, GSCQuotaError, GSCPermissionError)
Added auto-pagination utility for >25K rows
31 passing tests (schema validation + computed logic)

title: Published v1.0.0 to npm
items: Published mcp-server-gsc-pro@1.0.0 to npm
Updated vps-site .mcp.json to use mcp-server-gsc-pro

title: Adjacent Google APIs (Tier 1)
items: Google Indexing API — urlNotifications:publish for crawl requests (200/day)
PageSpeed Insights API — Lighthouse scores + CrUX field data per URL
CrUX API — Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, INP) by origin or URL
CrUX History API — 40-week rolling window of web vitals trends
Complete sites CRUD (sites.get, sites.add, sites.delete)
Mobile-friendly test (urlTestingTools.mobileFriendlyTest.run)

title: Computed intelligence v2 (Tier 2)
items: Indexing health report — batch inspect + sitemap URLs → indexed/crawled/not-found breakdown
Cannibalization resolver — detect + suggest canonical URL based on metrics
SERP feature tracking — searchAppearance dimension over time
Page-level health dashboard — combine inspection + analytics + vitals per URL
Automated drop alerts — detect pages with >50% traffic loss in 7 days
